sentences.english: The number above the beginning of each trace is the source azimuth and below is the epicentral distance.
sentences.chinese: 每條軌跡起點上的數字是震源方位角與震源深度。

sentences.english: Mathematical model of inclined angle and inclined azimuth is deduced.
sentences.chinese: 推導出傾斜角和方位角的數學模型。

sentences.english: Direction on the sphere is measured by azimuths .
sentences.chinese: 地球上的方向是通過方位角測定的。

sentences.english: Direction on the sphere is measured by azimuths.
sentences.chinese: 地球上的方向是通過方位角測定的。

sentences.english: The problem on the speaker tracking by way of estimating time delay of microphone arrays is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了利用傳聲器陣列估計與會者方位角的問題。

definition: angle of drift (navigation)/deflection (from course)/angle of divergence
